channel.title: 667 Change looks 1 Error

item.title: 667 Change looks 1 Error
item.dc:creator: @dillo1000 dillo1000
item.description:
@dillo1000 wrote:

Okay so I have one error in changing item looks

This is the part of the code that errors (667)

	public void sendItemsLook() {
		OutputStream stream = new OutputStream(2);
		stream.writePacket(player, 159);
		stream.writeByte(player.isOldItemsLook() ? 1 : 0);
		session.write(stream);
	}

The error

src\com\rs\net\encoders\WorldPacketsEncoder.java:48: error: method writePacket i
n class OutputStream cannot be applied to given types;
                stream.writePacket(player, 159);

Read full topic
